please_choose_a_number_to_edit_colon: Please choose a number to edit:
a_verification_code_has_been_sent_to_col: A verification code has been sent to:
a_verification_code_has_been_sent_to_you: A verification code has been sent to your phone number:
a_phone_call_with_your_verification_code: A phone call with your verification code has been placed to:
choose_how_to_receive_the_verification_c: Choose how to receive the verification code:
to_keep_your_account_secure_verification: To keep your account secure, a verification code will be sent whenever you log in from an unknown device.
edit_your_phone_number_where_verificatio: Edit your phone number where verification codes will be received:
scan_qr_code: Scan the QR code using your authenticator app
enter_totp_code: Enter the code generated by your authenticator app
totp_session_expired: The session has expired, please re-scan the QR code
an_error_has_occurred_please_try_again_l: An error has occurred, please try again later
cant_access_use_backup_codes: Can't access your app? Use a backup code
print_backup_codes_intro: Print out these codes and use them when you can't access your mobile device.
totp_verification_settings_intro: You have chosen to log in using time-based authentication. You can print backup codes to use in case you lose your device, or set up the authenticator in another device.
download_backup_codes: After logging in, you can download and save backup codes from your Profile Update screen
push_tfa_call_to_action: A notification was sent to your mobile device. Approve it to complete the login to your account
resend_push_notification: Didn't get the notification? Resend notification
